definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 随着石油价格的上涨，人们更加愿意使用电单车。

sentences.english: Then the price of oil began a nearly two-decade slide.
sentences.chinese: 随后，石油价格开始了近二十年的下滑。

sentences.english: He says this will help the industry, but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 他说，油价下降对航空业有好处，但这并不够。

sentences.english: Use the difference in gasoline prices to add to savings.
sentences.chinese: 利用汽油价格的差异来增加你的储蓄。

sentences.english: The country jumped their oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 该国突然大大提高了石油价格。

sentences.english: CPC's new prices took effect on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 中油的新油价已经在星期一生效。

sentences.english: Some OPEC states are hankering for even higher oil prices in the months ahead.
sentences.chinese: 一些欧佩克成员国甚至希望未来几个月的油价更高。

sentences.english: The Premier announces that state-run petroleum company will raise gasoline prices from midnight.
sentences.chinese: 总理宣布，国营石油公司将从午夜起调涨汽油价格。

sentences.english: As oil prices skyrocketed, Gaddafi and his family suddenly had more money than they knew what to do with.
sentences.chinese: 得利于油价的飙升，卡扎菲家族身价倍增。

sentences.english: In real prices, oil briefly fell back to pre-1973 levels.
sentences.chinese: 实际石油价格甚至短暂回复到1973年之前的水平。

sentences.english: Oil price skyrockets in China these days.
sentences.chinese: 这几天中国的油价飙升。

sentences.english: But as prices rise, the global economy is entering unknown territory.
sentences.chinese: 但是伴随油价上涨，世界经济正进入一个未知领域。

sentences.english: "At over $3 a gallon, it's high no matter what, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“油价大于每加仑3美元，怎么看都是高的。”

sentences.english: Well, what the high gas prices have to do with a bottle of tequila?
sentences.chinese: 高涨的油价和一瓶龙舌兰酒究竟有什么关系呢？

sentences.english: Have wide divided opinio regarding the oil price rises primary cause and the countermeasure people.
sentences.chinese: 对于油价上涨的主要原因和对策人们众说纷纭。

sentences.english: The market found only slight solace in retreating oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 市场仅在油价的回调中才找了些许安慰。

definition: OPEC/Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries

pinyin: Shi2 you2 Shu1 chu1 guo2 Zu3 zhi1

definition: to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
(of sales, prices etc) to fall/to drop/decline/slump
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
